author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with The Indie Hour Episode Nineteen! This series focuses on games you may have never even heard of and gives us an inside look at the wider world of independantly published Tabletop Wargames of all genres.

We're heading to a Post Apocalyptic 16th Century Japan this week for a 1-4 player Solo and CoOp Monster Hunting horror experience in Black Site Studio's HAMETSU. Did you love th Legends setting on Ghost of Tsushima? Then this is the game for you!

Check out the HAMETSU Rulebook HERE: https://blacksitestudio.com/en-ca/products/hametsu-core-rulebook
title: The GMG Indie Hour Ep 019 - HAMETSU by Black Site Studio
